item.title: COP30 ends with a whimper
item.description: The climate conference acknowledged that more climate action is needed, then failed to provide it

item.title: Donald Trump’s peace plan would be bad for Ukraine, bad for Europe and bad for America
item.description: It is a sad mix of naked opportunism and strategic myopia

item.title: Donald Trump’s peace plan would be bad for Ukraine, Europe and America
item.description: It is a sad mix of naked opportunism and strategic myopia

item.title: Checks and Balance newsletter: Donald Trump, Jamie Dimon and the aesthetics of power
item.description: Charlotte Howard, our executive editor and New York bureau chief, reflects on the architectural exploits of two very different leaders
